name: Auster
description:
Made for Mini Jam 30- Gameboy

Welcome to Auster. Duel against a friend in a retro game with elemental clouds that fight! Switch to the correct element to outwit your friend and wind. Game can be considered a combination of "Joust" and Rock Paper Scissors.

Gameplay:

Evaporate your opponent by crashing into them with the right element

Red > Green

Green > Blue

Blue > Red

Player 1 Controls:

Move, Jump, Crouch  - WASD

Change Colors - Space

Player 2 Controls:

Move, Jump, Crouch  - Arrows

Change Colors - Return

Credits:

Developed by Drew Bushnell

Music by Strikecast Audio (http://strikecastaudio.com/)

Pixel Art by Safwyl
